name: JIRA Dark 2020
description: Quick dark theme for JIRA in 2020.
additional_info: v1.0.6 - 2020.6.09 - Set html background to white. Removes the white columns to left and the right of the comment section. v1.0.5 - 2020.5.29 - Add SVG to no invert list v1.0.4 - 2020.1.23 - Fix iframe not inverting - add reverse invert for iframes v1.0.3 - 2020.1.23 - Fix default background color: set to rgb(30,30,30) v1.0.2 - 2020.1.23 - Fix emoji colors - add double filter v1.0.1 - 2020.1.21 - Fix scroll bug when using filter on body tag, switched to html tag - https://stackoverflow.com/questions/51589185/css-filter-invert-rule-breaking-fixed-position-on-chrome-68 - Fix white background on long comments v1.0.0 - 2020.1.21 Updated from: https://userstyles.org/styles/176813/jira-dark-that-works

discussions.name: BigGantt is not in dark mode.
Opening image attachment in a new tab shows the image misplaced
Opening image attachment in a new tab shows the image misplaced
